Description: Green painted pottery shabti of Nesast with black detail: a lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face, crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Curator's comments: In set with .9874 In set with .9875 In set with .9876 In set with .9877 In set with .9878 In set with .9879 In set with .9880
